entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Nain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:57 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nain Airport 3:46 PM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -18.5°C
Wind: NW 79 km/h gust 103 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm in the Natuashish area. Wind north 80 km/h gusting to 110. Temperature falling to minus 16 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
